name: @adobe/helix-publish
description: A microservice (for Adobe I/O Runtime) that publishes Helix configurations to Fastly

scripts.zip: npm ls --prod --parseable | grep node_modules | sed -e 's/.*node_modules/node_modules/' | xargs zip addlogger.zip -r src package.json index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && wsk action update addlogger addlogger.zip --kind nodejs:8 --web true --web-secure false --timeout 60000 -p CLIENT_EMAIL $CLIENT_EMAIL -p PRIVATE_KEY "$PRIVATE_KEY" -p PROJECT_ID $PROJECT_ID
scripts.delete-git-tag: git tag -d v$npm_package_version && git push origin :v$npm_package_version
